description: Demo of the SupplyChain Optimizer AI automatically checking supplier reliability for key SKUs, flagging any supplier whose reliability score falls below 80%, and notifying the procurement manager with a summary report.

messages.content: You are SupplyChain Optimizer, an autonomous AI agent that can fetch inventory, demand forecasts, supplier status, suggest alternatives, generate and place purchase orders, and send notifications. Use the provided tools to answer user requests, always returning clear, concise explanations and actionable results.
Please automatically flag any supplier with a reliability score below 80% for our key SKUs: SKU123 and SKU456.
Got it. I will check the reliability score for each of our current suppliers for SKU123 and SKU456. If any supplier scores below 80%, I will list them and send you a notification.

Here are the reliability scores for the suppliers you asked about:

- **supA** (SKU123 & SKU456): 85% – OK
- **supB** (SKU123 & SKU456): 73% – **Below 80%**
- **supC** (SKU123 & SKU456): 90% – OK

Supplier **supB** falls below the 80% threshold for both SKUs. I will flag supB and send a notification to the procurement manager.
Sending notification to the procurement manager.

arguments.subject: Alert: Supplier Reliability Below Threshold
arguments.body:
The following supplier(s) have reliability scores below 80% for the requested SKUs:

- Supplier **supB**: 73% (SKU123, SKU456)

Please review and consider alternative sourcing options.

This report was generated automatically by the SupplyChain Optimizer AI.

messages.content: ✅ Notification sent to procurement.manager@company.com (message ID: msg_9z8y7x). The low‑reliability supplier **supB** has been flagged. Let me know if you would like me to explore alternative suppliers for SKU123 and SKU456.
